verses.verse: אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> that came to Jeremiah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in דִּבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> concerning הַבַּצָּרֽוֹת׃ <S%H1226><s%> the dearth

אָבְלָ֣ה <S%H56><s%> mourneth יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וּשְׁעָרֶ֥יהָ <S%H8179><s%> and the gates אֻמְלְל֖וּ <S%H535><s%> thereof languish קָדְר֣וּ <S%H6937><s%> they are black לָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the ground וְצִוְחַ֥ת <S%H6682><s%> and the cry יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem עָלָֽתָה׃ <S%H5927><s%> is gone up

וְאַדִּ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H117><s%> And their nobles שָׁלְח֥וּ <S%H7971><s%> have sent [צְעֹורֵיהֶם כ] (צְעִירֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6810><s%> least ק) לַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> to the waters בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> they came עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto גֵּבִ֞ים <S%H1356><s%> the cisterns לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no מָ֣צְאוּ <S%H4672><s%> [and] found מַ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> no water שָׁ֤בוּ <S%H7725><s%> they returned כְלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H3627><s%> with their vessels רֵיקָ֔ם <S%H7387><s%> empty בֹּ֥שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> they were ashamed וְהָכְלְמ֖וּ <S%H3637><s%> and confounded וְחָפ֥וּ <S%H2645><s%> and covered רֹאשָֽׁם׃ <S%H7218><s%> their heads

בַּעֲב֤וּר <S%H5668><s%> Because הָאֲדָמָה֙ <S%H127><s%> Because the ground חַ֔תָּה <S%H2865><s%> is chapt כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> has been גֶ֖שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> for there was no rain בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth בֹּ֥שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> were ashamed אִכָּרִ֖ים <S%H406><s%> the plowmen חָפ֥וּ <S%H2645><s%> they covered רֹאשָֽׁם׃ <S%H7218><s%> their heads

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> even אַיֶּ֙לֶת֙ <S%H365><s%> Yea the hind בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field יָלְדָ֖ה <S%H3205><s%> also calved וְעָז֑וֹב <S%H5800><s%> and forsook כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> is no הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become דֶּֽשֶׁא׃ <S%H1877><s%> [it] because there was no grass

וּפְרָאִים֙ <S%H6501><s%> And the wild asses עָמְד֣וּ <S%H5975><s%> did stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׁפָיִ֔ם <S%H8205><s%> in the high places שָׁאֲפ֥וּ <S%H7602><s%> they snuffed up ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the wind כַּתַּנִּ֑ים <S%H8577><s%> like dragons כָּל֥וּ <S%H3615><s%> did fail עֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> their eyes כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there עֵֽשֶׂב׃ <S%H6212><s%> because [there was] no grass

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Although עֲוֹנֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5771><s%> though our iniquities עָ֣נוּ <S%H6030><s%> testify בָ֔נוּ יְהוָ֕ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD עֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> against us do לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> sake שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <S%H8034><s%> thou [it] for thy name's כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Truly רַבּ֥וּ <S%H7231><s%> are many מְשׁוּבֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H4878><s%> sake for our backslidings לְךָ֥ חָטָֽאנוּ׃ <S%H2398><s%> we have sinned

מִקְוֵה֙ <S%H4723><s%> O the hope יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֽוֹשִׁיע֖וֹ <S%H3467><s%> the saviour בְּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> thereof in time צָרָ֑ה <S%H6869><s%> of trouble לָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תִֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> like כְּגֵ֣ר <S%H1616><s%> why shouldest thou be as a stranger בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land וּכְאֹרֵ֖חַ <S%H732><s%> and as a wayfaring man נָטָ֥ה <S%H5186><s%> [that] turneth aside לָלֽוּן׃ <S%H3885><s%> to tarry for a night

לָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תִֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> like כְּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Why shouldest thou be as a man נִדְהָ֔ם <S%H1724><s%> astonied כְּגִבּ֖וֹר <S%H1368><s%> as a mighty man לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יוּכַ֣ל <S%H3201><s%> [that] cannot לְהוֹשִׁ֑יעַ <S%H3467><s%> save וְאַתָּ֧ה <S%H859><s%> in בְקִרְבֵּ֣נוּ <S%H7130><s%> [art] in the midst יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> ? yet thou O LORD וְשִׁמְךָ֛ <S%H8034><s%> by thy name עָלֵ֥ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and we נִקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> of us and we are called אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּנִּחֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H3240><s%> leave ס

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> unto this people הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> to this כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> so אָֽהֲבוּ֙ <S%H157><s%> Thus have they loved לָנ֔וּעַ <S%H5128><s%> to wander רַגְלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H7272><s%> their feet לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not חָשָׂ֑כוּ <S%H2820><s%> they have not refrained וַיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> therefore the LORD לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not רָצָ֔ם <S%H7521><s%> doth not accept עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> now יִזְכֹּ֣ר <S%H2142><s%> them he will now remember עֲוֹנָ֔ם <S%H5771><s%> their iniquity וְיִפְקֹ֖ד <S%H6485><s%> and visit חַטֹּאתָֽם׃ <S%H2403><s%> their sins ס

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּתְפַּלֵּ֛ל <S%H6419><s%> unto me Pray בְּעַד־ <S%H1157><s%> about הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> not for this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> of this לְטוֹבָֽה׃ <S%H2896><s%> for [their] good

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> When יָצֻ֗מוּ <S%H6684><s%> When they fast אֵינֶ֤נִּי <S%H369><s%> I am not שֹׁמֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H8085><s%> I will not hear אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רִנָּתָ֔ם <S%H7440><s%> their cry וְכִ֧י <S%H3588><s%> and when יַעֲל֛וּ <S%H5927><s%> and when they offer עֹלָ֥ה <S%H5930><s%> burnt offering וּמִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> and an oblation אֵינֶ֣נִּי <S%H369><s%> I am not רֹצָ֑ם <S%H7521><s%> I will not accept כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> Rather בַּחֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> them by the sword וּבָרָעָ֣ב <S%H7458><s%> and by the famine וּבַדֶּ֔בֶר <S%H1698><s%> and by the pestilence אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I מְכַלֶּ֥ה <S%H3615><s%> them but I will consume אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> ס

וָאֹמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֲהָ֣הּ ׀ <S%H162><s%> I Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Look הַנְּבִאִ֜ים <S%H5030><s%> behold the prophets אֹמְרִ֤ים <S%H559><s%> say לָהֶם֙ לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> unto them Ye shall not see חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the sword וְרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> neither shall ye have famine לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> have לָכֶ֑ם כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שְׁל֤וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace אֱמֶת֙ <S%H571><s%> you assured אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> but I will give לָכֶ֔ם בַּמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Then the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> about שֶׁ֚קֶר <S%H8267><s%> lies הַנְּבִאִים֙ <S%H5030><s%> unto me The prophets נִבְּאִ֣ים <S%H5012><s%> prophesy בִּשְׁמִ֔י <S%H8034><s%> in my name לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> have neither שְׁלַחְתִּים֙ <S%H7971><s%> I sent וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor צִוִּיתִ֔ים <S%H6680><s%> them not neither have I commanded וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor דִבַּ֖רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> them neither spake אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about חֲז֨וֹן <S%H2377><s%> vision שֶׁ֜קֶר <S%H8267><s%> unto you a false וְקֶ֤סֶם <S%H7081><s%> and divination [וֶאֱלוּל כ] (וֶֽאֱלִיל֙ <S%H457><s%> idol ק) [וְתַרְמוּת כ] (וְתַרְמִ֣ית <S%H8649><s%> deceit ק) לִבָּ֔ם <S%H3820><s%> of their heart הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they מִֽתְנַבְּאִ֥ים <S%H5012><s%> unto them they prophesy לָכֶֽם׃ ס

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning הַנְּבִאִ֞ים <S%H5030><s%> concerning the prophets הַנִּבְּאִ֣ים <S%H5012><s%> that prophesy בִּשְׁמִי֮ <S%H8034><s%> in my name וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> There לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will be no שְׁלַחְתִּים֒ <S%H7971><s%> and I sent וְהֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> those אֹֽמְרִ֔ים <S%H559><s%> them not yet they say חֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Sword וְרָעָ֔ב <S%H7458><s%> and famine לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> will be no יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> shall not be in this land הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise בַּחֶ֤רֶב <S%H2719><s%> By sword וּבָֽרָעָב֙ <S%H7458><s%> and famine יִתַּ֔מּוּ <S%H8552><s%> be consumed הַנְּבִאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> shall those prophets הָהֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> those

וְהָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> to whom הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> them נִבְּאִ֣ים <S%H5012><s%> to whom they prophesy לָהֶ֡ם <S%H1992><s%> like יִֽהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become מֻשְׁלָכִים֩ <S%H7993><s%> shall be cast out בְּחֻצ֨וֹת <S%H2351><s%> in the streets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem מִפְּנֵ֣י ׀ <S%H6440><s%> because הָרָעָ֣ב <S%H7458><s%> of the famine וְהַחֶ֗רֶב <S%H2719><s%> and the sword וְאֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> and there מְקַבֵּר֙ <S%H6912><s%> and they shall have none to bury לָהֵ֔מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like נְשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <S%H802><s%> them their wives וּבְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> nor their sons וּבְנֹֽתֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H1323><s%> nor their daughters וְשָׁפַכְתִּ֥י <S%H8210><s%> for I will pour עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָעָתָֽם׃ <S%H7451><s%> their wickedness

וְאָמַרְתָּ֤ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thou shalt say אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this word הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this תֵּרַ֨דְנָה <S%H3381><s%> run down עֵינַ֥י <S%H5869><s%> unto them Let mine eyes דִּמְעָ֛ה <S%H1832><s%> with tears לַ֥יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> night וְיוֹמָ֖ם <S%H3119><s%> and day וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּדְמֶ֑ינָה <S%H1820><s%> and let them not cease כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for שֶׁ֨בֶר <S%H7665><s%> is broken גָּד֜וֹל <S%H1419><s%> with a great נִשְׁבְּרָ֗ה <S%H7667><s%> breach בְּתוּלַת֙ <S%H1330><s%> for the virgin בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> of my people מַכָּ֖ה <S%H4347><s%> blow נַחְלָ֥ה <S%H2470><s%> grievous מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> with a very

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יָצָ֣אתִי <S%H3318><s%> If I go forth הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> into the field וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> Behold חַלְלֵי־ <S%H2491><s%> then behold the slain חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword וְאִם֙ <S%H518><s%> if בָּ֣אתִי <S%H935><s%> and if I enter הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> into the city וְהִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold תַּחֲלוּאֵ֣י <S%H8463><s%> then behold them that are sick רָעָ֑ב <S%H7458><s%> with famine כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> both נָבִ֧יא <S%H5030><s%> yea both the prophet גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> both כֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest סָחֲר֥וּ <S%H5503><s%> go about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into a land וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדָֽעוּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> that they know ס
